answers.answer: I took my 1hr yesterday abd they said i failed miserably. I have to take my 3hr tomorrow. :(

I failed both and have gestational diabetes for the second time... They are making me go on a strict diet again & test my blood sugar levels But on the bright side i lost like 40 lbs last time & felt great!! Good luck!

I have gd.strick diet and taking blood glucos test 3 times a day.im Finding it really hard to get my head around the diet but im sure ill get there soon.I love carbs and always have so cutting down is killing me.My nurse said that most if not all people lose weight with it which would be great although as weird as i sounds i really dont want to coz im getting marries 6weeks after babys born.Once u get ur head around it all im sure its grand.

My doctor and I have decided to just skip the testing since I was with my last pregnancy. I have been having some bad blood sugar drops and had been dreading that drink. I just about passed out with the 3 hour before. Many people can control it with diet, I did last time just by diet. Eventually it just becomes natural to look at the carbs. I hope you pass the test, but if you don't, just follow the diet. Avoid carbs, eat protein and veggies, and have 3 small-medium meals with 2 snacks. Follow your dietitians advice and good luck to all of you.
